mapper.select:
SELECT TITLE ,IDX_KEY ,HIER_LEV_NO ,ORD FROM( SELECT TITLE ,IDX_KEY ,HIER_LEV_NO ,ORD FROM ( SELECT '용어기준' AS "TITLE" ,'' AS IDX_KEY ,'1' AS HIER_LEV_NO ,1 AS ORD FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT '숫자(0-9)' AS "TITLE" ,'0-9' AS IDX_KEY ,'2' AS HIER_LEV_NO ,2 AS ORD FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT '알파벳(A-Z)' AS "TITLE" ,'A-Z' AS IDX_KEY ,'2' AS HIER_LEV_NO ,3 AS ORD FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'ㄱ ~ ㄷ' AS "TITLE" ,'가-딯' AS IDX_KEY ,'2' AS HIER_LEV_NO ,4 AS ORD FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'ㄹ ~ ㅂ' AS "TITLE" ,'라-빟' AS IDX_KEY ,'2' AS HIER_LEV_NO ,5 AS ORD FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'ㅅ ~ ㅈ' AS "TITLE" ,'사-짛' AS IDX_KEY ,'2' AS HIER_LEV_NO ,6 AS ORD FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT
'ㅊ ~ ㅎ' AS "TITLE" ,'차-힣' AS IDX_KEY ,'2' AS HIER_LEV_NO ,7 AS ORD FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT '[전체]' AS "TITLE" ,'' AS IDX_KEY ,'2' AS HIER_LEV_NO ,8 AS ORD FROM DUAL ) T101 UNION ALL SELECT TITLE ,IDX_KEY ,HIER_LEV_NO ,ORD FROM ( SELECT '도메인기준' AS "TITLE" ,'' AS IDX_KEY ,'1' AS HIER_LEV_NO ,9 AS ORD FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT T101.OBJ_NM AS "TITLE" ,T101.OBJ_NM AS IDX_KEY ,'2' AS HIER_LEV_NO ,10 AS ORD FROM PEN_OBJ_M T101 WHERE T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID = '010304L' AND T101.DEL_YN = 'N' UNION ALL SELECT '[전체]' AS "TITLE" ,'' AS IDX_KEY ,'2' AS HIER_LEV_NO ,11 AS ORD FROM DUAL ) T101 UNION ALL SELECT TITLE ,IDX_KEY ,HIER_LEV_NO ,ORD FROM ( SELECT '분류어기준' AS "TITLE" ,'' AS IDX_KEY ,'1' AS HIER_LEV_NO ,12 AS ORD FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT T101.OBJ_NM AS "TITLE" ,T101.OBJ_NM AS IDX_KEY ,'2' AS HIER_LEV_NO ,13 AS ORD FROM PEN_OBJ_M T101 INNER JOIN PEN_OBJ_D T102 ON (T102.OBJ_TYPE_ID=T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND T102.OBJ_ID=T101.OBJ_ID AND T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 101 AND T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL = 'Y') WHERE T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID = '010301L' UNION ALL SELECT '[전체]' AS "TITLE" , '[전체]' AS IDX_KEY ,'2' AS HIER_LEV_NO ,14 AS ORD FROM DUAL ) T101 ) ORDER BY ORD,TITLE

SELECT T1.OBJ_TYPE_ID AS OBJ_TYPE_ID , T1.OBJ_ID AS OBJ_ID , T1.OBJ_NM AS OBJ_NM , T1.ADM_OBJ_ID AS OBJ_ENG_ABBR_NM , T1.OBJ_ABBR_NM AS OBJ_ENG_NM , T2.OBJ_ATR_VAL AS CLSD_YN , COALESCE(T3.CNT, 0) AS TERM_CNT , T1.OBJ_DESC AS OBJ_DESC , T1.CRETR_ID AS CRETR_ID , DATAEYE_PKG.getDisplayUserName(T1.CRETR_ID) AS CRETR_NM FROM PEN_OBJ_M T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN PEN_OBJ_D T2 ON (T1.OBJ_TYPE_ID = T2.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND T1.OBJ_ID = T2.OBJ_ID AND T2.ATR_ID_SEQ = 101) LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT OBJ_ATR_VAL, COUNT(*) CNT FROM (SELECT OBJ_ATR_VAL FROM PEN_OBJ_D WHERE OBJ_TYPE_ID = '010302L' AND ATR_ID_SEQ IN (102,103,104,105,106,107,108,109) AND ATR_VAL_SEQ = 101 AND DEL_YN = 'N' UNION ALL SELECT PATH_OBJ_ID AS OBJ_ATR_VAL FROM PEN_OBJ_M WHERE OBJ_TYPE_ID = '010302L' AND DEL_YN = 'N' ) GROUP BY OBJ_ATR_VAL ) T3 ON (T1.OBJ_ID = T3.OBJ_ATR_VAL) WHERE T1.DEL_YN = 'N' AND T1.OBJ_TYPE_ID = '010301L' AND T1.OBJ_NM = REGEXP_SUBSTR(T1.OBJ_NM, '^[0-9].*') ORDER BY T1.OBJ_NM ASC

SELECT * FROM (SELECT T2.OBJ_TYPE_ID AS OBJ_TYPE_ID , T2.OBJ_ID AS OBJ_ID , T2.OBJ_NM AS OBJ_NM , T2.ADM_OBJ_ID AS OBJ_ENG_ABBR_NM , T2.OBJ_DESC AS OBJ_DESC , T4.OBJ_NM AS DMN_NM , T2.CRETR_ID AS CRETR_ID , DATAEYE_PKG.getDisplayUserName(T2.CRETR_ID) AS CRETR_NM FROM PEN_OBJ_D T1 INNER JOIN PEN_OBJ_M T2 ON (T1.OBJ_TYPE_ID = T2.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND T1.OBJ_ID = T2.OBJ_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN PEN_OBJ_D T3 ON (T2.OBJ_TYPE_ID = T3.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND T2.OBJ_ID = T3.OBJ_ID AND T3.ATR_ID_SEQ = 101) LEFT OUTER JOIN PEN_OBJ_M T4 ON (T3.OBJ_ATR_VAL = T4.OBJ_ID) WHERE T1.OBJ_TYPE_ID = '010302L' AND T2.DEL_YN = 'N' AND T1.ATR_ID_SEQ IN (102,103,104,105,106,107,108,109) AND T1.ATR_VAL_SEQ = 101 AND T1.OBJ_ATR_VAL = #{objId} UNION ALL SELECT T1.OBJ_TYPE_ID AS OBJ_TYPE_ID , T1.OBJ_ID AS OBJ_ID , T1.OBJ_NM AS OBJ_NM , T1.ADM_OBJ_ID AS OBJ_ENG_ABBR_NM , T1.OBJ_DESC AS OBJ_DESC , T4.OBJ_NM AS DMN_NM , T1.CRETR_ID AS CRETR_ID , DATAEYE_PKG.getDisplayUserName(T1.CRETR_ID) AS CRETR_NM FROM PEN_OBJ_M T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN PEN_OBJ_D T3 ON (T1.OBJ_TYPE_ID = T3.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND T1.OBJ_ID = T3.OBJ_ID AND T3.ATR_ID_SEQ = 101) LEFT OUTER JOIN PEN_OBJ_M T4 ON (T3.OBJ_ATR_VAL = T4.OBJ_ID) WHERE T1.OBJ_TYPE_ID = #{objId} AND T1.PATH_OBJ_ID = '010302L' AND T1.DEL_YN = 'N' ) T101 ORDER BY T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID,T101.OBJ_ID

SELECT T2.OBJ_TYPE_ID AS OBJ_TYPE_ID , T2.OBJ_ID AS OBJ_ID , T2.OBJ_NM AS OBJ_NM , T2.ADM_OBJ_ID AS OBJ_ENG_ABBR_NM , T2.OBJ_DESC AS OBJ_DESC , T2.CRETR_ID AS CRETR_ID , DATAEYE_PKG.getDisplayUserName(T2.CRETR_ID) AS CRETR_NM FROM PEN_OBJ_D T1 INNER JOIN PEN_OBJ_M T2 ON (T1.OBJ_TYPE_ID = T2.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND T1.OBJ_ID = T2.OBJ_ID) WHERE T1.OBJ_TYPE_ID = '010302L' AND T1.ATR_ID_SEQ = 101 AND T1.ATR_VAL_SEQ = 101 AND T1.OBJ_ATR_VAL = #{objId} AND T2.DEL_YN='N' ORDER BY T2.OBJ_TYPE_ID, T2.OBJ_ID

SELECT OBJ_TYPE_ID , OBJ_ID , OBJ_NM , OBJ_ENG_ABBR_NM , 0 AS USED_CNT , OBJ_DESC , CRETR_ID , DATAEYE_PKG.getDisplayUserName(T101.CRETR_ID) AS CRETR_NM , DMN_OBJ_NM , DATAEYE_PKG.getDispalyDataType(BAS_DATA_TYPE, COL_LEN, COL_POINT_LEN) AS BAS_DISP_DATA_TYPE , DATAEYE_PKG.getDispalyDataType(ORACLE_DATA_TYPE, COL_LEN, COL_POINT_LEN) AS ORACLE_DATA_TYPE , DATAEYE_PKG.getDispalyDataType(PDA_DATA_TYPE, COL_LEN, COL_POINT_LEN) AS PDA_DATA_TYPE , DATAEYE_PKG.getDispalyDataType(IMPALA_DATA_TYPE, COL_LEN, COL_POINT_LEN) AS IMPALA_DATA_TYPE , COL_LEN , COL_POINT_LEN FROM (SELECT T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID AS OBJ_TYPE_ID , T101.OBJ_ID AS OBJ_ID , T101.OBJ_NM AS OBJ_NM , T101.ADM_OBJ_ID AS OBJ_ENG_ABBR_NM , 0 AS USED_CNT , T101.OBJ_DESC AS OBJ_DESC , T101.CRETR_ID AS CRETR_ID , T104.OBJ_NM AS DMN_OBJ_NM , MAX( CASE WHEN T105.ATR_ID_SEQ = 101 THEN T105.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) AS BAS_DATA_TYPE , MAX( CASE WHEN T105.ATR_ID_SEQ = 111 THEN T105.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) AS ORACLE_DATA_TYPE , MAX( CASE WHEN T105.ATR_ID_SEQ = 112 THEN T105.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) AS PDA_DATA_TYPE , MAX( CASE WHEN T105.ATR_ID_SEQ = 113 THEN T105.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) AS IMPALA_DATA_TYPE , MAX( CASE WHEN T105.ATR_ID_SEQ = 102 THEN T105.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) AS COL_LEN , MAX( CASE WHEN T105.ATR_ID_SEQ = 103 THEN T105.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) AS COL_POINT_LEN FROM PEN_OBJ_M T101 LEFT OUTER JOIN PEN_OBJ_M T102 ON ( T101.PATH_OBJ_TYPE_ID = T102.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND T101.PATH_OBJ_ID = T102.OBJ_ID ) LEFT OUTER JOIN PEN_OBJ_D T103 ON ( T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID = T103.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND T101.OBJ_ID = T103.OBJ_ID AND T103.ATR_ID_SEQ = 101 ) LEFT OUTER JOIN PEN_OBJ_M T104 ON ( T103.OBJ_ATR_VAL = T104.OBJ_ID AND T104.OBJ_TYPE_ID = '010303L' ) LEFT OUTER JOIN PEN_OBJ_D T105 ON ( T105.OBJ_TYPE_ID = T104.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND T105.OBJ_ID = T104.OBJ_ID AND T105.ATR_ID_SEQ IN (101, 102, 103, 111, 112, 113) ) WHERE T101.DEL_YN = 'N' AND T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID = '010302L' /*표준용어*/
AND T101.${searchKey} LIKE '%'||#{searchValue}||'%'
AND T101.OBJ_NM = REGEXP_SUBSTR(T101.OBJ_NM, '^[0-9].*')
AND T101.OBJ_NM = REGEXP_SUBSTR(T101.OBJ_NM, '^[A-Za-z].*')
AND T101.OBJ_NM >= '가' AND T101.OBJ_NM < '라'
AND T101.OBJ_NM >= '라' AND T101.OBJ_NM < '사'
AND T101.OBJ_NM >= '사' AND T101.OBJ_NM < '차'
AND T101.OBJ_NM >= '차' AND T101.OBJ_NM < '힝'
AND T101.OBJ_NM LIKE '%'|| #{idxKey} ||'%'
GROUP BY T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID , T101.OBJ_ID , T101.OBJ_NM , T101.ADM_OBJ_ID , T101.OBJ_DESC , T101.CRETR_ID , T104.OBJ_NM ) T101 ORDER BY T101.OBJ_NM ASC

SELECT T1.ATR_ID_SEQ AS ATR_ID_SEQ , T2.OBJ_TYPE_ID AS OBJ_TYPE_ID , T2.OBJ_ID AS OBJ_ID , T2.OBJ_NM AS OBJ_NM , T2.ADM_OBJ_ID AS OBJ_ENG_ABBR_NM , COALESCE(T3.CNT,0) AS USED_CNT , T2.OBJ_ABBR_NM AS OBJ_ENG_NM , T2.OBJ_DESC AS OBJ_DESC , T2.CRETR_ID AS CRETR_ID , DATAEYE_PKG.getDisplayUserName(T2.CRETR_ID) AS CRETR_NM FROM PEN_OBJ_D T1 JOIN PEN_OBJ_M T2 ON (T1.OBJ_ATR_VAL = T2.OBJ_ID AND T2.OBJ_TYPE_ID = '010301L') LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT OBJ_ID, COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM (SELECT PATH_OBJ_TYPE_ID AS OBJ_TYPE_ID , PATH_OBJ_ID AS OBJ_ID FROM PEN_OBJ_M WHERE OBJ_TYPE_ID = '010302L' AND DEL_YN = 'N' UNION ALL SELECT '010301L', OBJ_ATR_VAL FROM PEN_OBJ_D WHERE OBJ_TYPE_ID = '010302L' AND ATR_ID_SEQ = 102 AND DEL_YN = 'N' UNION ALL SELECT '010301L', OBJ_ATR_VAL FROM PEN_OBJ_D WHERE OBJ_TYPE_ID = '010302L' AND ATR_ID_SEQ = 103 AND DEL_YN = 'N' UNION ALL SELECT '010301L', OBJ_ATR_VAL FROM PEN_OBJ_D WHERE OBJ_TYPE_ID = '010302L' AND ATR_ID_SEQ = 104 AND DEL_YN = 'N' UNION ALL SELECT '010301L', OBJ_ATR_VAL FROM PEN_OBJ_D WHERE OBJ_TYPE_ID = '010302L' AND ATR_ID_SEQ = 105 AND DEL_YN = 'N' UNION ALL SELECT '010301L', OBJ_ATR_VAL FROM PEN_OBJ_D WHERE OBJ_TYPE_ID = '010302L' AND ATR_ID_SEQ = 106 AND DEL_YN = 'N' UNION ALL SELECT '010301L', OBJ_ATR_VAL FROM PEN_OBJ_D WHERE OBJ_TYPE_ID = '010302L' AND ATR_ID_SEQ = 107 AND DEL_YN = 'N' UNION ALL SELECT '010301L', OBJ_ATR_VAL FROM PEN_OBJ_D WHERE OBJ_TYPE_ID = '010302L' AND ATR_ID_SEQ = 108 AND DEL_YN = 'N' UNION ALL SELECT '010301L', OBJ_ATR_VAL FROM PEN_OBJ_D WHERE OBJ_TYPE_ID = '010302L' AND ATR_ID_SEQ = 109 AND DEL_YN = 'N' ) GROUP BY OBJ_ID ) T3 ON (T2.OBJ_ID = T3.OBJ_ID) WHERE T1.OBJ_TYPE_ID = '010302L' AND T1.ATR_VAL_SEQ = 101 AND T1.OBJ_ID = #{objId} /*변수 : 표준용어 ID*/ UNION ALL SELECT 999 AS ATR_ID_SEQ , T2.OBJ_TYPE_ID AS OBJ_TYPE_ID , T2.OBJ_ID AS OBJ_ID , T2.OBJ_NM AS OBJ_NM , T2.ADM_OBJ_ID AS OBJ_ENG_ABBR_NM , COALESCE(T3.CNT,0) AS USED_CNT , T2.OBJ_ABBR_NM AS OBJ_ENG_NM , T2.OBJ_DESC AS OBJ_DESC , T2.CRETR_ID AS CRETR_ID , TO_CHAR(T4.USER_NM) AS CRETR_NM FROM PEN_OBJ_M T1 JOIN PEN_OBJ_M T2 ON (T1.PATH_OBJ_TYPE_ID = T2.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND T1.PATH_OBJ_ID = T2.OBJ_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT OBJ_ID, COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM (SELECT PATH_OBJ_TYPE_ID AS OBJ_TYPE_ID , PATH_OBJ_ID AS OBJ_ID FROM PEN_OBJ_M WHERE OBJ_TYPE_ID = '010302L' AND DEL_YN = 'N' UNION ALL SELECT '010301L', OBJ_ATR_VAL FROM PEN_OBJ_D WHERE OBJ_TYPE_ID = '010302L' AND ATR_ID_SEQ = 102 AND DEL_YN = 'N' UNION ALL SELECT '010301L', OBJ_ATR_VAL FROM PEN_OBJ_D WHERE OBJ_TYPE_ID = '010302L' AND ATR_ID_SEQ = 103 AND DEL_YN = 'N' UNION ALL SELECT '010301L', OBJ_ATR_VAL FROM PEN_OBJ_D WHERE OBJ_TYPE_ID = '010302L' AND ATR_ID_SEQ = 104 AND DEL_YN = 'N' UNION ALL SELECT '010301L', OBJ_ATR_VAL FROM PEN_OBJ_D WHERE OBJ_TYPE_ID = '010302L' AND ATR_ID_SEQ = 105 AND DEL_YN = 'N' UNION ALL SELECT '010301L', OBJ_ATR_VAL FROM PEN_OBJ_D WHERE OBJ_TYPE_ID = '010302L' AND ATR_ID_SEQ = 106 AND DEL_YN = 'N' UNION ALL SELECT '010301L', OBJ_ATR_VAL FROM PEN_OBJ_D WHERE OBJ_TYPE_ID = '010302L' AND ATR_ID_SEQ = 107 AND DEL_YN = 'N' UNION ALL SELECT '010301L', OBJ_ATR_VAL FROM PEN_OBJ_D WHERE OBJ_TYPE_ID = '010302L' AND ATR_ID_SEQ = 108 AND DEL_YN = 'N' UNION ALL SELECT '010301L', OBJ_ATR_VAL FROM PEN_OBJ_D WHERE OBJ_TYPE_ID = '010302L' AND ATR_ID_SEQ = 109 AND DEL_YN = 'N' ) GROUP BY OBJ_ID ) T3 ON (T2.OBJ_ID = T3.OBJ_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN PEN_USER_M T4 ON (T2.CRETR_ID = T4.USER_ID) WHERE T1.OBJ_TYPE_ID = '010302L' AND T1.OBJ_ID = #{objId} ORDER BY ATR_ID_SEQ

SELECT ADM_OBJ_ID AS WORD_ABBR_NM
, OBJ_NM AS WORD_NM
FROM PEN_OBJ_M WHERE OBJ_TYPE_ID = '010301L' AND DEL_YN = 'N'
SELECT OBJ_ID ,OBJ_NM FROM PEN_OBJ_M WHERE OBJ_TYPE_ID = '010303L' AND DEL_YN = 'N'

SELECT '${objTypeId}_'||TRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(MAX(SUBSTR(OBJ_ID, 9)),0)+1, '000000009')) AS OBJ_ID FROM PEN_OBJ_M WHERE OBJ_TYPE_ID = #{objTypeId} AND OBJ_ID LIKE #{objTypeId}||'_%' AND UPPER(SUBSTR(OBJ_ID, 9)) = LOWER(SUBSTR(OBJ_ID, 9))
SELECT OBJ_NM FROM PEN_OBJ_M WHERE OBJ_TYPE_ID = '010303L' AND DEL_YN = 'N'
SELECT OBJ_NM FROM PEN_OBJ_M WHERE OBJ_TYPE_ID = '010304L' AND DEL_YN = 'N'
SELECT CD_NM FROM PEN_CD_M WHERE CD_GRP_ID = 'NETESSADB DATATYPE'
SELECT OBJ_ID ,OBJ_NM FROM PEN_OBJ_M WHERE OBJ_TYPE_ID = '010304L' AND DEL_YN = 'N'
